rules_text:
Draw three cards. You may play two additional lands this turn.
Conspire [i](As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“Oh, I'm doing my part. I'm patrolling... That's it—patrolling. Gotta put these ears and nose to work, don't I?”[/i]
